channel.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
channel.description:
as the topic says my friend wants to sell his wow account to fund my vps and a rs account because we haf no way to get payapl money it is level 85 any good sites? oh and 1 more thing does any1 of you know where is a good place to sell wow membership cards?
ty

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I moved this topic into general questions, as it’s more of a question than a discussion.

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:21, topic:444822”][quote author=tomato721 link=topic=547507.msg4014527#msg4014527 date=1339514587]
Wtf 12$? do u buy like an annual pass from ur credit card or sumthing cuz we buy it from game cards of 60$ a month or 180 dhs
[/quote]
No… I buy it from the blizzard store lol.[/quote]
the only reason we are selling this account is to get virtual money e.g paypal

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I currently play wow and bought everything from the blizzard store

WoW isn’t as expensive as people think, owning a console sucks more money than wow. 2 hrs of minimum wage a month pays for wow… thats not alot.

And no its $12 a month

Read full topic
item.source: Advice on selling a wow account?

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

uhm are u shure its 140$ for 1 year and all expansions is 80$?
anyways we dont live in usa so the prices may differ
all i know is my friend pays around 30$ per month
60$ for 2 month game cards

Read full topic
item.source: Advice on selling a wow account?

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

lol what? all the expansions total $80… and thats only if you started playing during cataclysm. 1 year of wow is only $140, which is better than phasing through 3 console games.

Read full topic
item.source: Advice on selling a wow account?

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

Whackatre:

The amount of time he spent on the game could have been used to work minimum wage for much more pay.

technically the amount of time he spent on the game could been used to work NO WAGE for MORE MONEY
cuz u actually pay more for membershit than the account is worth unless you play 24/7 anyways hes had this account for like 1 year and has paid like 3-400$ in membershit and expansion costs alone

anyways not everything is money otherwise he would’nt quest like all his xp he got from quests and he barely ever trains on 1 npc

Read full topic

The amount of time he spent on the game could have been used to work minimum wage for much more pay.

@tomato721 wrote:

my friend already posted im sythe for 200$ i doubt it will get sold though
he is probably gona sell it to those websites that pay u paypal cash for the account
but im afraid he may get scammed so i wanted to know any good sites that would pay u cash
for your account

quests dont matter, and theres no need to bot because skilling isnt as bad of a grind as rs

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @tomato721 tomato721
item.description:
@tomato721 wrote:

Frell:

85 isnt an accomplishment in wow, tons of people sell 85s. Its no where near as valuable as a 138 in rs unless its fully geared with great mounts etc.

well i have never played wow before but i do know that it is harder to bot in wow
and the fact that membershit costs wayyy more then runescape

also my friend is more of a quester type and has done over 1500 quests but the downside is that he dosent haf much money or epic mounts

Read full topic

item.title: Advice on selling a wow account?
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:

If I were you…
I wouldn’t trust any website until you know somebody has used it without any hacks or any other things.

[/quote]

do u know ahy website that can be trusted?[/quote]
No, i’ve never even played wow
I just hate to see people get scammed blind ._.
